name: Stick War: Castle Defence
description:
Paying homage to an era of stickmen and flash games, whilst diving into modern day, rpg inspired combat and progression. Hone a unique play style to combat hordes of unmotivated stickmen, as they attempt to storm your castle. Learn abilities, unlock runes and spend your wealth to improve your defences, all whilst finding new ways to put stickmen to rest!Features:
  • 3 Unique Playable Hero's.
  • Each hero comes with their own set of abilities to suit many playstyles.
  • Second layer of gameplay customization through the use of unlockable 'Runes'.
  • Unlockable castle upgrades such as defensive towers, barracks and more.
  • Purchasable consumables to alter the way you face your enemies.
  • Large variety of enemy types as you progress into more difficult stages of the game.
  • All the joy that comes with fully ragdoll enabled stickmen!
